TcAttribute.description: The property CMBvrTag is an untyped reference to a BOMView Revision object which is the subject of this BOMEdit object. Property CMBvrTag is necessary to associate the BOMEdit object with the BOMView Revision object. A NULL value is not allowed.

The property CMChangeRevTag is an untyped reference to a ChangeItemRevision object associated with this BOMEdit object. Property CMChangeRevTag is applicable when Change Management is used to manage the changes to a BOMView Revision and allows a genealogy of the changes to be kept. This property may be NULL if Change Management is not used to manage the changes for this BOMEdit object.

The property CMChangeType is an integer which represents the type of change made by this BOMEdit object. Types of BOM changes may include add, cancel, quantity change, reshape, etc. A NULL value is not allowed.

The property CMIsDerived is a boolean which represents whether the BOMEdit object is for a derived value. A true value indicates that the BOMEdit object is for a derived value. A NULL value is not allowed.

The property CMCustomObjTag is an untyped reference to a custom object associated with the BOMEdit object. Property CMCustomObjTag allows users to associate their own custom object with a BOMEdit object through server customizations. This property may be NULL if the user has not associated any custom object with the BOMEdit object.

The property CMOccurenceTag is an untyped reference to a PSOccurrence object associated with this BOMEdit object. This PSOccurrence object is the new occurrence being applied as a result of this edit. This property may be NULL if the BOMEdit object is not used to record a change to an occurrence.

Property cm0UpdatedProperties is a string array which represents updated properties of BOMLine for which BOMEdit is created. Property cm0UpdatedProperties is a string array value which is used to determine what all properties are modified for the BOMEdit and it is used to display property differences in Change Summary. NULL value allowed.

Property CMImpactedBvr is an untyped reference to a BOMView Revision object which represents the top-level BOMView Revision object of a BOM structure on which the changes are made. A NULL value is not allowed.

Property CMBOMAddList is an array of typed references to BOMEdit objects which represents a list of added elements to a BOM structure. This property may be NULL if no elements were added to the BOM structure for this supersedure.

Property CMBOMCancelList is an array of typed references to BOMEdit objects which represents a list of removed elements from a BOM structure. This property may be NULL if no elements were removed from the BOM structure for this supersedure.

Property CMIsTransfer is a boolean which represents whether the supersedure involves a transfer of a part from one level of an assembly to another level of the same assembly. When property CMIsTransfer is set to true, this supersedure involves a part transfer between levels. A NULL value is not allowed.

Property cm0IncorporationStatus is a string which represents the incorporation status of an impacted item of an unincorporated change. Property cm0IncorporationStatus is a string value from the Cm0IncorporationStatusValues LOV. NULL value allowed, and if NULL would indicate the impacted item is not part of an unincorporated change.
This property is used for impacted disposition value

Property cm0LineageGroupId is a string which identifies the lineage grouping ID. A group of impacted objects may be associated with a group of solution objects, creating a set of CMSolutionToImpacted relation objects with the same cm0LineageGroupId string value and that group of CMSolutionToImpacted relation objects with the same cm0LineageGroupId value constitutes the lineage group. NULL value not allowed.

Property CMClosure is a string which represents the overall open or closed state of the change object. Property CMClosure in combination with CMDisposition and CMMaturity properties are collectively referred to as the change object's state vectors that provide a more granular description of the overall state of the change object. Property CMClosure is one of several possible string values found in a string LOV of the same name i.e. CMClosure. NULL value allowed.

Property CMDisposition is a string which represents the overall disposition state of the change object. Property CMDisposition in combination with CMClosure and CMMaturity properties are collectively referred to as the change object's state vectors that provide a more granular description of the overall state of the change object. Property CMDisposition is one of several possible string values found in a string LOV of the same name i.e. CMDisposition. NULL value allowed.

Property CMMaturity is a string which represents the overall maturity state of the change object. Property CMMaturity in combination with CMDisposition and CMClosure properties are collectively referred to as the change object's state vectors that provide a more granular description of the overall state of the change object. Property CMMaturity is one of several possible string values found in a string LOV of the same name i.e. CMMaturity. NULL value allowed.
Property CMClosureComments is a string which represents optional comments that accompany the CMClosure property state setting. NULL value allowed.
Property CMDispositionComments is a string which represents optional comments that accompany the CMDisposition property state setting. NULL value allowed.
Property CMClosureDate is a date which represents the date that the CMClosure property state setting was last changed. NULL value allowed.
Property CMDispositionDate is a date which represents the date that the CMDisposition property state setting was last changed. NULL value allowed.
Property customers is an array of references to Company objects which represents the customers associated with this change object. NULL value allowed.
Property Cm0impact_types is an array of strings which represents the types of impacts of this ChangeNoticeRevision object. NULL value allowed.

Property CMImplPriority is a string which represents a relative implementation priority for the issue represented by this ChangeNoticeRevision object. Property CMImplPriority is a string value selected from a list of string values derived from the LOV called CM Priority with default values {1,2,3,4}. Property CMImplPriority can be used to help decide which implementations to work on first. NULL value allowed.

Property CMIsCustApprovalRequired is a string which represents whether one or more customers must approve the change represented by this ChangeNoticeRevision object. Property CMIsCustApprovalRequired is a string value selected from a list of string values derived from the LOV called CM YesNo with default values {Yes,No}. NULL value allowed.

Property CMStatusOfCustApproval is a string which represents whether the customers approved or disapproved the change represented by this ChangeNoticeRevision object. Property CMStatusOfCustApproval is a string value selected from a list of string values derived from the LOV called CM CN Approval with default values {Approved, Disapproved}. NULL value allowed.
Property CMDateOfCustApproval is a date which represents when the customer approval was last updated for this ChangeNoticeRevision object. NULL value allowed.

Property CMSpecialInstruction is a string which represents special instructions from the ChangeImplementationBoard participants to the Analyst participant and change implementation team. NULL value allowed.
Property Cm0impact_types is an array of strings which represents the types of impacts of this ChangeRequestRevision object. NULL value allowed.
Property Cm0is_warranty_affected is a boolean which represents whether the impacts of this ChangeRequestRevision object include impacting the warranty. NULL value allowed.

Property CMReason is a string which represents a description of the reason category for the existence of this ChangeRequestRevision object. Property CMReason is a string value selected from a list of string values derived from the LOV called CM CR Reason with default values {To Fix,To Prevent,To Improve}. Businesses usually can identify different types of changes (e.g. safety, performance) that they process on a regular basis and these should become the values in the LOV for this property. NULL value allowed.

Property CMTechReviewPriority is a string which represents a technical review priority for the issue represented by this ChangeRequestRevision object. Property CMTechReviewPriority is a string value selected from a list of string values derived from the LOV called CM Priority with default values {1,2,3,4}. Property CMTechReviewPriority can be used to help decide which problems to work on first. NULL value allowed.
Property CMRecurringCost is a double which represents an estimate of the incremental costs of the changed product. NULL value allowed.
Property CMNonrecurringCost is a double which represents an estimate of the total costs to implement the change. NULL value allowed.
Property CMTechRecommDate is a date which represents when the technical recommendation was last updated for this ChangeRequestRevision object. NULL value allowed.

Property CMTestResultsAttached is a string which represents whether the test results documentation has been attached for the issue represented by this ChangeRequestRevision object. Property CMTestResultsAttached is a string value selected from a list of string values derived from the LOV called CM YesNo with default values {Yes,No}. NULL value allowed.

Property CMProposedSolution is a string which typically represents the change Analyst participant's recommended technical solution in enough detail to enable a cost-benefit decision. For standard track changes, a simple description in this field is not enough, so the Analyst participant may attach other documents or BOM markups or preliminary implementation plan (Schedule object) or any other item as-needed to describe the proposed solution. In this case, those items should be briefly described here. NULL value allowed.

Property CMTimingFactors is a string which represents input from the ChangeReviewBoard or Analyst participants on requirements, opinions or guidance to the ChangeImplementationBoard participants regarding the setting of effectivity, and therefore the implementation timing, for the change. NULL value allowed.

Property CMTechnicalRecommendation is a string which represents a technical recommendation category for the issue represented by this ChangeRequestRevision object. Property CMTechnicalRecommendation is a string value selected from a list of string values derived from the LOV called CM Tech Recommendation with default values {Problem Confirmed,Problem Not Confirmed,Another Problem}. NULL value allowed.

Property CMTechnicalReview is a string which represents a technical review category for the issue represented by this ChangeRequestRevision object. Property CMTechnicalReview is a string value selected from a list of string values derived from the LOV called CM Tech Review with default values {1,2} ; where 1 = Requestor Solution is Acceptable, and 2 = Another Solution is Proposed. NULL value allowed.
Property cm0ActionType is a string which represents what type of action item it is to more fully describe this object. NULL value is allowed.
Property cm0Comments is a string which represents general comments for this Cm0ActionItemRevision object. NULL value allowed.
Property cm0OfficePriResp is a string which represents primary person responsible for this Cm0ActionItemRevision object. NULL value allowed.
Property cm0Zones is a string which represents the product zones affected by this Cm0ActionItemRevision object. NULL value allowed.
Property cm0Comments is a string which represents general comments for this Cm0CfgAuditRevision object. NULL value allowed.
Property cm0ProcessDate is a date which represents the date of the audit or review for this Cm0CfgAuditRevision object. NULL value allowed.
Property Cm0change_type is a string which represents what type of deviation item it is to more fully describe this object. NULL value is not allowed.
Property Cm0is_deviation_recurring is a boolean which represents whether this is a recurring deviation or not. NULL value allowed.
Property Cm0rational_for_recurr is a string which represents the rationale for recurring deviation setting. NULL value allowed.
Property cm0AuditType is a string which represents what type of audit or review item it is to more fully describe this object. NULL value is allowed.

Property CMIsFastTrack is a string which represents whether this ChangeNoticeRevision is to be processed as fast track or not. Property CMIsFastTrack is a string value selected from a list of string values derived from the LOV called CMII CN Fast Track with default values {Yes,No}. Property CMIsFastTrack can be used to flag the change object for an accelerated business process, with less steps and overhead. NULL value allowed.

Property CMIsFastTrack is a string which represents whether this ChangeRequestRevision is to be processed as fast track or not. Property CMIsFastTrack is a string value selected from a list of string values derived from the LOV called CMII CR Fast Track with default values {Yes,No}. Property CMIsFastTrack can be used to flag the change object for an accelerated business process, with less steps and overhead. NULL value allowed.

Property CMTechReviewPriority is a string which represents a technical review priority for the issue represented by this ProblemReportRevision object. Property CMTechReviewPriority is a string value selected from a list of string values derived from the LOV called CM Priority with default values {1,2,3,4}. Property CMTechReviewPriority can be used to help decide which problems to work on first. NULL value allowed.

Property CMSeverityRating is a string which represents an assessed severity rating for the issue represented by this ProblemReportRevision object. Property CMSeverityRating is a string value selected from a list of string values derived from the LOV called CM Priority with default values {1,2,3,4}. Property CMSeverityRating can be used to help decide which problems to work on first. NULL value allowed.
Property CMEnvironmentDescription is a string which represents description of the environment for the issue represented by this ProblemReportRevision object. NULL value allowed.
Property CMVerification is a string which represents a description of the verification of the issue represented by this ProblemReportRevision object. NULL value allowed.

Property CMRamification is a string which represents a description of the potential ramifications that may happen if the issue represented by this ProblemReportRevision object is not resolved. NULL value allowed.

Property CMSequenceOfEvents is a string which represents a description of the sequence of events for the issue represented by this ProblemReportRevision object, which may help in reproducing the issue. NULL value allowed.

TcForm.description: This class has been introduced to store and represent Action Item data
This class has been introduced to store and represent Action Item Revision data
This class has been derived from the abstract class Cm0GnReview to store and represent Configuration Audit data
This class will be used to store and represent Configuration Audit data
This abstract class will be used to represent generic Audit data.
This abstract class will be used to represent generic Audit Revision data

TcRuntimeType.description: Cm0ProposedImpactedObject used to represent row of information in impact analyser table. Cm0ProposedImpactedObject includes details on problem object, proposed impacted object, source object, relation by which problem object is associated with proposed impacted object and whether the proposed impacted object is already impacted object on ECR/ECN.

TcProperty.description: Property cm0ProblemObject is reference property which represents the problem item associated with Change Request Revision/Change Notice Revision.
Property cm0ProposedImpactedObject is reference property which represents the proposed impacted item that can be added to Change Request Revision/Change Notice Revision as impacted item.
Property cm0ProposedImpactedObjName is string property which represents the name of proposed impacted.
Property cm0ProposedImpactedType is string property which represents if proposed impacted object type.
Property cm0SourceObject is reference property which represents the problem item associated with Change Request Revision/Change Notice Revision.
Property cm0SourceObjectType is string property which represents if source of proposed impacted object is retrieved from an assembly or relation.
Property cm0IsAlreadyImpacted is boolean property which represents if proposed impacted object is already added as impacted item on Change Notice Revision/Change Request Revision.
Property cm0Relation is reference property which represents relation by which problem object is associated to proposed impacted object.
Property cm0HasChildren is boolean property which represents if proposed impacted object has children.
Property cm0Children is array reference property which represents the children of proposed impacted object.

TcStandardType.description: Analyst object is a subclass of Participant object which is a dynamic staffing position associated with ItemRevision objects that is used for assignment responsibilities for single assignee tasks in workflows and responsibilities in change management. The Analyst staffing position is part of the Change Management feature and typically has key technical lead responsibilities with an associated change object. Analyst is used in the Teamcenter Workflow and Change Management functional areas.

CMHasImpactedItem is a relation object used to associate an ItemRevision secondary object with a GnChangeRequestRevision or GnChangeNoticeRevision primary object. The impacted ItemRevision object will typically have a new revision added to the GnChangeNoticeRevision primary object via a CMHasSolutionItem relation object. CMHasImpactedItem relation object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.

TcProperty.description: Property cm0LineageGroupId is a runtime string which identifies the lineage grouping ID. Derived from any CMSolutionToImpacted relation object associated with the same impacted object of the same change object.

Property cm0ImplementingChgNotices is a runtime array of references to ChangeNoticeRevision objects which represents the change objects providing solutions for this impacted item. Property cm0ImplementingChgNotices allows lists of impacted items from a ChangeRequestRevision object perspective to identify their respective implementing ChangeNoticeRevision objects and provide accountability.

Property cm0ImplementingSolutions is an array of references to WorkspaceObjects which represents the list of solution object related to the impacted object of this relation via the CMSolutionToImpacted relation object. Property cm0ImplementingSolutions allows lists of impacted object from a ChangeRequestRevision object and or ChangeNoticeRevision object perspective to identify their respective implementing solution objects and provide accountability.

TcStandardType.description: CMHasProblemItem is a relation object used to associate an ItemRevision secondary object with a ChangeItemRevision primary object. The problem ItemRevision is typically used to identify ItemRevision objects that are the perceived cause of an issue or problem. CMHasProblemItem relation object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.

CMHasSolutionItem is a relation object used to associate an ItemRevision secondary object with a GnChangeNoticeRevision primary object. The solution ItemRevision may have an older revision added to the GnChangeNoticeRevision primary object via a CMHasImpactedItem relation. CMHasSolutionItem relation object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.

TcProperty.description: Property cm0LineageGroupId is a runtime string which identifies the lineage grouping ID. Derived from any CMSolutionToImpacted relation object associated with the same solution object of the same change object.

TcStandardType.description: CMHasWorkBreakdown is a relation object used to associate a Schedule object with a ChangeItemRevision object. The Schedule object is used as an implementation plan for the change object. CMHasWorkBreakdown relation object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management and Schedule Manager functional areas.

CMImplements is a relation object used to associate a ChangeItemRevision secondary object with a ChangeItemRevision primary object. The CMImplements relation ChangeItemRevision primary object is a more mature change object than the ChangeItemRevision secondary object that it's implementing; for example a GnChangeNoticeRevision will be primary object and implement a GnChangeRequestRevision secondary object or a GnChangeRequestRevision will be a primary object and implement a GnProblemReportRevision secondary object. CMImplements relation object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.

CMReferences is a relation object used to associate a WorkspaceObject secondary object with a ChangeItemRevision primary object. The secondary objects are not managed by the change object they are merely references. CMReferences relation object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.

CMRelation is an abstract subclass of the ImanRelation object used to associate a secondary object with a change primary object. The CMRelation abstract class provides a common hierarchical ancestor for the change management relation classes. CMRelation relation object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.

CMSolutionToImpacted is a relation object used to associate an ItemRevision secondary object (related to a GnChangeNoticeRevision via the CMHasSolutionItem relation) with an ItemRevision primary object (related to same GnChangeNoticeRevision as the secondary object via the CMHasImpactedItem relation). The CMSolutionToImpacted relation provides lineage between solutions and impacted items of a change. CMSolutionToImpacted relation object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.

ChangeImplementationBoard object is a subclass of Participant object which is a dynamic staffing position associated with ItemRevision objects that is used for assignment responsibilities for multi-assignee tasks in workflows and responsibilities in change management. The ChangeImplementationBoard staffing position is part of the Change Management feature and typically has review and approval of implementation plan responsibilities with an associated change object. ChangeImplementationBoard is used in the Teamcenter Workflow and Change Management functional areas.

ChangeItem object is an abstract subclass of Item for change items to be used in change management to manage objects associated with a change management business process. ChangeItem object is the highest level change item in the class hierarchy of which all other change items are subclasses. The revisions of a ChangeItem are represented by the ChangeItemRevision business object. ChangeItem object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.
Form Storage object for "ChangeItem Master" business object
Form Storage object for "ChangeItemRevision Master" business object

ChangeNotice object is a subclass of GnChangeNotice for change items to be used in change management to manage objects associated with a change management business process. ChangeNotice object is the type of change object used to manage the implementation of ChangeRequest object(s), plan implementation, review and approve implementation plan, execute implementation plan and develop solutions, set effectivity and release the change object and its solutions. The revisions of a ChangeNotice are represented by the ChangeNoticeRevision business object. ChangeNotice object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.
Form Storage object for "ChangeNotice Master" business object
Form Storage object for "ChangeNoticeRevision Master" business object

ChangeRequest object is a subclass of GnChangeRequest for change items to be used in change management to manage objects associated with a change management business process. ChangeRequest object is the type of change object used to manage the implementation of ProblemReport object(s), perform impact analysis, propose technical solutions, estimate the cost and authorize the implementation phase of the change. The revisions of a ChangeRequest are represented by the ChangeRequestRevision business object. ChangeRequest object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.
Form Storage object for "ChangeRequest Master" business object
Form Storage object for "ChangeRequestRevision Master" business object

ChangeReviewBoard object is a subclass of Participant object which is a dynamic staffing position associated with ItemRevision objects that is used for assignment responsibilities for multi-assignee tasks in workflows and responsibilities in change management. The ChangeReviewBoard staffing position is part of the Change Management feature and typically has review and approval of solution plan responsibilities with an associated change object. ChangeReviewBoard is used in the Teamcenter Workflow and Change Management functional areas.

ChangeSpecialist1 object is a subclass of Participant object which is a dynamic staffing position associated with ItemRevision objects that is used for assignment responsibilities for single assignee tasks in workflows and responsibilities in change management. The ChangeSpecialist1 staffing position is part of the Change Management feature and typically has key administrative management responsibilities with an associated change object. There are ChangeSpecialist1, ChangeSpecialist2 and ChangeSpecialist3 objects, but by default it is only ChangeSpecialist1 we use in Teamcenter Change Management. The other two are there to comply with CMII industry standard and can be exposed and used by customers if they wish. ChangeSpecialist1 is used in the Teamcenter Workflow and Change Management functional areas.

ChangeSpecialist2 object is a subclass of Participant object which is a dynamic staffing position associated with ItemRevision objects that is used for assignment responsibilities for single assignee tasks in workflows and responsibilities in change management. The ChangeSpecialist2 staffing position is part of the Change Management feature and typically has key administrative management responsibilities with an associated change object. There are ChangeSpecialist1, ChangeSpecialist2 and ChangeSpecialist3 objects, but by default it is only ChangeSpecialist1 we use in Teamcenter Change Management. The other two are there to comply with CMII industry standard and can be exposed and used by customers if they wish. ChangeSpecialist2 is used in the Teamcenter Workflow and Change Management functional areas.

ChangeSpecialist3 object is a subclass of Participant object which is a dynamic staffing position associated with ItemRevision objects that is used for assignment responsibilities for single assignee tasks in workflows and responsibilities in change management. The ChangeSpecialist3 staffing position is part of the Change Management feature and typically has key administrative management responsibilities with an associated change object. There are ChangeSpecialist1, ChangeSpecialist2 and ChangeSpecialist3 objects, but by default it is only ChangeSpecialist1 we use in Teamcenter Change Management. The other two are there to comply with CMII industry standard and can be exposed and used by customers if they wish. ChangeSpecialist3 is used in the Teamcenter Workflow and Change Management functional areas.

Cm0ActionItem object is a subclass of ProblemReport for change items to be used in change management to manage objects associated with a change management business process. Cm0ActionItem object is a type of change object used in connection with a review audit process, related via a Cm0RaisesActionItems GRM relation to its revision object, to manage the documentation of an issue, reproduction of an issue, determine issue severity and priority, and disposition the issue. The revisions of a Cm0ActionItem are represented by the Cm0ActionItem Revision business object. Cm0ActionItem object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.
Form Storage object for "Cm0ActionItemMaster" business object
Form Storage object for "Cm0ActionItemRevisionMaster" business object

Cm0ActionItemRevision object is a subclass of ProblemReportRevision for change items to be used in change management to manage objects associated with a change management business process. Cm0ActionItemRevision object is the type of change object used in connection with a review audit process, related via a Cm0RaisesActionItems GRM relation, to manage the documentation of an issue, reproduction of an issue, determine issue severity and priority, and disposition the issue. The Cm0ActionItemRevision business object adds the following properties: cm0Comments, cm0OfficePriResp, cm0Zones, cm0RaisedByAudit. Cm0ActionItemRevision object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.

TcProperty.description: Property cm0RaisedByAudit is a runtime array of references to Cm0CfgAuditRevision objects which represents the configuration audit revisions raised by this Cm0ActionItemRevision object. These Cm0CfgAuditRevision objects are associated with this Cm0ActionItemRevision object via the Cm0RaisesActionItems relation objects where this Cm0ActionItemRevision object is the primary referenced object and where the secondary referenced object is the Cm0CfgAuditRevision object.

TcStandardType.description: Cm0AuditsItem is a relation object used to associate a WorkspaceObject object with a Cm0GnReviewRevision object. The Cm0AuditsItem relation is used to associate work objects that are the subject of a review audit. Cm0AuditsItem relation object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.

Provides the association between a BOM Markup (Fnd0Markup) and the ChangeItemRevision (ChangeRequestRevision or ChangeNoticeRevision) that is the change context authorizing the markup. Cm0AuthorizingMarkupChange relation object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.

Cm0BOMHasSupersedureForm is a relation object used to associate a Form object to a BOMSupersedure object. Cm0BOMHasSupersedureForm is used in the Teamcenter Change Management and Structure Management functional areas.

Cm0BeforeDependency is a relation object used to associate a ChangeNoticeRevision with another ChangeNoticeRevision. The Cm0BeforeDependency impacts the adding of a release status to the primary ChangeNoticeRevision of this relation, the secondary of this relation must be either released already or a target of the same workflow adding the release status to the primary ChangeNoticeRevision, otherwise the addition of the release status will be disallowed. Cm0BeforeDependency relation object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.

Cm0CfgAudit object is a subclass of Cm0GnReview for change items to be used in change management to manage objects associated with a change management business process. Cm0CfgAudit object is a type of change object used in connection with a configuration audit process, to manage the configuration audit data and issues (actions) raised. The revisions of a Cm0CfgAudit are represented by the Cm0CfgAuditRevision business object. Cm0CfgAudit object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.
Form Storage object for "Cm0CfgAuditMaster" business object
Form Storage object for "Cm0CfgAuditRevisionMaster" business object

Cm0CfgAuditRevision object is a subclass of Cm0GnReviewRevision for change items to be used in change management to manage objects associated with a change management business process. Cm0CfgAuditRevision object is the type of change object used in connection with a configuration audit process, to manage the configuration audit data and issues (actions) raised. The Cm0CfgAuditRevision business object adds the following key properties: cm0Comments and cm0ProcessDate. Cm0CfgAuditRevision object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.

Cm0ChangeContributors object is a subclass of Participant object which is a dynamic staffing position associated with ItemRevision objects that is used for assignment responsibilities for multiple assignee tasks in workflows and responsibilities in change management. The Cm0ChangeContributors staffing position is part of the Change Management feature and member of this participant have access to contribuite to change process. Cm0ChangeContributors is used in the Teamcenter Workflow and Change Management functional areas.

Cm0ConcurrentDependency is a relation object used to associate a ChangeNoticeRevision with another ChangeNoticeRevision. The Cm0ConcurrentDependency impacts the adding of a release status to both the primary and secondary ChangeNoticeRevision of this relation, they both must be targets of the same workflow adding the release status; otherwise the addition of the release status will be disallowed. Cm0ConcurrentDependency relation object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.

Cm0DevRqst object is a subclass of ChangeRequest for change items to be used in change management to manage objects associated with a change management business process. Cm0DevRqst object is the type of change object used to manage the data associated with temporary or one off configuration deviations from the design. The revisions of a Cm0DevRqst are represented by the Cm0DevRqstRevision business object. Cm0DevRqst object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.
Form Storage object for "Cm0DevRqstMaster" business object
Form Storage object for "Cm0DevRqstRevisionMaster" business object

Cm0DevRqstRevision object is a subclass of ChangeRequestRevision for change items to be used in change management to manage objects associated with a change management business process. Cm0DevRqstRevision object is the type of change object used to manage the data associated with temporary or one off configuration deviations from the design. The Cm0DevRqstRevision business object adds the following properties: Cm0is_deviation_recurring and Cm0rational_for_recurr. Cm0DevRqstRevision object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.

Cm0EffectivityExprBlock is used to store the effectivity expression.Cm0EffectivityExprBlock extends the functionality provided by the Effectivity Expression Block (Fnd0EffectivityExprBlock) for the configured objects. It stores the effectivity expression for the configured affected object which is stored in fnd0affectedObject.This business object is used by Change Manager and its downstream applications. Downstream applications can extend this class if needed for overwriting any behavior.

Cm0GnReview object is an abstract subclass of ChangeItem for change items to be used in change management to manage objects associated with a change management business process. Cm0GnReview object is a generic type of change object used in connection with a review audit process, to manage the audit data and issues (actions) raised. This generic type of Cm0GnReview provides another extension point in the change object hierarchy that will be common to all its subclasses including Cm0CfgAudit. The revisions of a Cm0GnReview are represented by the Cm0GnReviewRevision business object. Cm0GnReview object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.
Form Storage object for "Cm0GnReviewMaster" business object
Form Storage object for "Cm0GnReviewRevisionMaster" business object

Cm0GnReviewRevision object is an abstract subclass of ChangeItemRevision for change items to be used in change management to manage objects associated with a change management business process. Cm0GnReviewRevision object is the type of change object used in connection with a review audit process, to manage the audit data and issues (actions) raised. This generic type of Cm0GnReviewRevision provides another extension point in the change object hierarchy that will be common to all its subclasses including Cm0CfgAuditRevision. The Cm0GnReviewRevision business object adds the following key properties: Cm0RaisesActionItems, Cm0AuditsItem, Cm0HasContract and cm0isAuditsItemPresent. Cm0GnReviewRevision object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.

TcProperty.description: Property Cm0RaisesActionItems is an array of Cm0RaisesActionItems relation objects where this change object is the primary referenced object and where the secondary referenced object is a Cm0ActionItemRevision object. Property Cm0RaisesActionItems provides a list of action items associated with a review audit.

Property Cm0AuditsItem is an array of Cm0AuditsItem relation objects where this change object is the primary referenced object and where the secondary referenced object is a WorkspaceObject object. Property Cm0AuditsItem provides a list of audit items associated with a review audit.

Property Cm0HasContract is an array of Cm0HasContract relation objects where this change object is the primary referenced object and where the secondary referenced object is a DocumentRevision object. Property Cm0HasContract provides a list of contracts associated with a review audit.

TcStandardType.description: Cm0GnWorkOrder object is an abstract subclass of ChangeItem for change items to be used in change management to manage objects associated with a change management business process. Cm0GnWorkOrder object is a generic type of change object typically used in connection with executing the design changes authorized by an approved and complete ChangeNoticeRevision, to manage the shop floor execution data. This generic type of Cm0GnWorkOrder provides another extension point in the change object hierarchy that will be common to all its subclasses. The revisions of a Cm0GnWorkOrder are represented by the Cm0GnWorkOrderRevision business object. Cm0GnWorkOrder object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.
Form Storage object for "Cm0GnWorkOrderMaster" business object
Form Storage object for "Cm0GnWorkOrderRevisionMaster" business object

Cm0GnWorkOrderRevision object is an abstract subclass of ChangeItemRevision for change items to be used in change management to manage objects associated with a change management business process. Cm0GnWorkOrderRevision object is the type of change object typically used in connection with executing the design changes authorized by an approved and complete ChangeNoticeRevision, to manage the shop floor execution data. This generic type of Cm0GnWorkOrderRevision provides another extension point in the change object hierarchy that will be common to all its subclasses. Cm0GnWorkOrderRevision object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.

Cm0HasChangeSpace is a relation object used to associate a POM_space object with a GnChangeNoticeRevision object. The POM_space is used as a container for change solution objects that are non-public versions of 4G data. Cm0HasChangeSpace relation object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.

Cm0HasContract is a relation object used to associate a DocumentRevision object with a Cm0GnReviewRevision object. The Cm0HasContract relation is used to associate a contract document with a review audit. Cm0HasContract relation object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.

Cm0HasProposal is a relation object used to associate an Fnd0MarkupSpace (proposal) object with a ChangeItemRevision object. The Cm0HasProposal relation is used to identify the proposals that contribute solution ideas to a ChangeItemRevision object. Cm0HasProposal relation object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.

Cm0Incorporates is a relation object used to associate a WorkspaceObject object with a ChangeItemRevision object. The Cm0Incorporates relation identifies the partially incorporated objects that are being incorporated by the ChangeItemRevision primary object. Cm0Incorporates relation object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.

Cm0Merged is a relation object used to associate a POM_space object with an Fnd0MarkupSpace (proposal) object. The Cm0Merged relation is used to identify the proposals that had some of their content merged to the POM_space of a ChangeNoticeRevision. Cm0Merged relation object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.

Cm0PreviousEffectivity is a relation object used to associate an Effectivity object with a ChangeItemRevision object. The Cm0PreviousEffectivity relation is used to associate a previous Effectivity object used to configure the child revisions of an ItemRevision that is related via a CMHasImpacted relation to a ChangeItemRevision object. Cm0PreviousEffectivity relation object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.

Cm0RaisesActionItems object is a subclass of CMRelation used to relate Cm0GnReviewRevision primary object with Cm0ActionItemRevision objects. Cm0RaisesActionItems is used to associate action items with a review audit. Cm0RaisesActionItems object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.

Cm0WorkingEnvironment is a relation object used to associate a WorkspaceObject object with a GnChangeNoticeRevision object. The Cm0WorkingEnvironment relation is used to associate container object that is used to store a list of objects loaded for certain features, so that subsequent sessions can resume where they left off, a sort of bookmark. Cm0WorkingEnvironment relation object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management and other functional areas that use a change object as an edit context.

GnChangeNotice object is an abstract subclass of ChangeItem for change items to be used in change management to manage objects associated with a change management business process. GnChangeNotice object is a generic type of change object used to manage the implementation of GnChangeRequest object(s), plan implementation, review and approve implementation plan, execute implementation plan and develop solutions, set effectivity and release the change object and its solutions. This generic type of ChangeNotice provides another extension point in the change object hierarchy that will be common to all its subclasses including ChangeNotice. The revisions of a GnChangeNotice are represented by the GnChangeNoticeRevision business object. GnChangeNotice object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.
Form Storage object for "GnChangeNotice Master" business object

GnChangeNoticeRevision object is an abstract subclass of ChangeItemRevision for change items to be used in change management to manage objects associated with a change management business process. GnChangeNoticeRevision object is the type of change object used to manage the implementation of GnChangeRequest object(s), plan implementation, review and approve implementation plan, execute implementation plan and develop solutions, set effectivity and release the change object and its solutions. This generic type of GnChangeNoticeRevision provides another extension point in the change object hierarchy that will be common to all its subclasses including ChangeNoticeRevision. The GnChangeNoticeRevision business object adds key properties for change space and dependency relations. GnChangeNoticeRevision object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.

TcProperty.description: Property Cm0HasChangeSpace is an array of Cm0HasChangeSpace relation objects where this GnChangeNoticeRevision object is the primary referenced object and where the secondary referenced object is a POM_space object that may be used as a container for change solution objects that are non-public versions of 4G data.

Property Cm0BeforeDependency is an array of Cm0BeforeDependency relation objects where this GnChangeNoticeRevision object is the primary referenced object and where the secondary referenced GnChangeNoticeRevision object must be either released already or a target of the same workflow adding the release status to the primary ChangeNoticeRevision, otherwise the addition of the release status will be disallowed.

Property Cm0ConcurrentDependency is an array of Cm0ConcurrentDependency relation objects where this GnChangeNoticeRevision object is the primary referenced object and where the secondary is another GnChangeNoticeRevision object. When adding a release status to either the primary or secondary ChangeNoticeRevision of this relation, they both must be targets of the same workflow adding the release status; otherwise the addition of the release status will be disallowed.
Runtime property representing the effectivity formula which is used to configure this object

TcStandardType.description: Form Storage object for "GnChangeNoticeRevision Master" business object

GnChangeRequest object is an abstract subclass of ChangeItem for change items to be used in change management to manage objects associated with a change management business process. GnChangeRequest object is the type of change object used to manage the implementation of GnProblemReport object(s), perform impact analysis, propose technical solutions, estimate the cost and authorize the implementation phase of the change. This generic type of GnChangeRequest provides another extension point in the change object hierarchy that will be common to all its subclasses including ChangeRequest and Cm0DevRequest. The revisions of a GnChangeRequest are represented by the GnChangeRequestRevision business object. GnChangeRequest object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.
Form Storage object for "GnChangeRequest Master" business object

GnChangeRequestRevision object is an abstract subclass of ChangeItemRevision for change items to be used in change management to manage objects associated with a change management business process. GnChangeRequestRevision object is the type of change object used to manage the implementation of GnProblemReportRevision object(s), perform impact analysis, propose technical solutions, estimate the cost and authorize the implementation phase of the change. This generic type of GnChangeRequestRevision provides another extension point in the change object hierarchy that will be common to all its subclasses including ChangeRequestRevision and Cm0DevRequestRevision. The GnChangeRequestRevision business object adds a CMIsFastTrack property. GnChangeRequestRevision object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.
Form Storage object for "GnChangeRequestRevision Master" business object

GnProblemReport object is an abstract subclass of ChangeItem for change items to be used in change management to manage objects associated with a change management business process. GnProblemReport object is a generic type of change object used to manage the documentation of an issue, reproduction of an issue, determine issue severity and priority, and disposition the issue. This generic type of ProblemReport provides another extension point in the change object hierarchy that will be common to all its subclasses including ProblemReport. The revisions of a GnProblemReport are represented by the GnProblemReportRevision business object. GnProblemReport object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.
Form Storage object for "GnProblemReport Master" business object

GnProblemReportRevision object is an abstract subclass of ChangeItemRevision for change items to be used in change management to manage objects associated with a change management business process. GnProblemReportRevision object is the type of change object used to manage the documentation of an issue, reproduction of an issue, determine issue severity and priority, and disposition the issue. This generic type of GnProblemReportRevision provides another extension point in the change object hierarchy that will be common to all its subclasses including ProblemReportRevision and Cm0ActionItemRevision. GnProblemReportRevision object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.
Form Storage object for "GnProblemReportRevision Master" business object

ProblemReport object is a subclass of GnProblemReport for change items to be used in change management to manage objects associated with a change management business process. ProblemReport object is a type of change object used to manage the documentation of an issue, reproduction of an issue, determine issue severity and priority, and disposition the issue. The revisions of a ProblemReport are represented by the ProblemReportRevision business object. ProblemReport object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.
Form Storage object for "ProblemReport Master" business object
Form Storage object for "ProblemReportRevision Master" business object

Requestor object is a subclass of Participant object which is a dynamic staffing position associated with ItemRevision objects that is used for assignment responsibilities for single assignee tasks in workflows and responsibilities in change management. The Requestor staffing position is part of the Change Management feature and typically has the requirements owner responsibilities with an associated change object. The Requestor object by default is initially set to the creator/owner of the associated change object. Requestor is used in the Teamcenter Workflow and Change Management functional areas.

TcProperty.description: Provides the association between a BOM Markup (Fnd0Markup) and the ChangeItemRevision (ChangeRequestRevision or ChangeNoticeRevision) that is the change context authorizing the markup. Cm0AuthorizingMarkupChange relation object is used in the Teamcenter Change Management functional area.

Property CMHasImpactedItem is an array of CMHasImpactedItem relation objects where this ScheduleTask object is the primary referenced object and where the secondary referenced object is a change managed object that will be revised for a solution.

Property CMHasProblemItem is an array of CMHasProblemItem relation objects where this ScheduleTask object is the primary referenced object and where the secondary referenced object is a change managed object that is the perceived cause of an issue or problem for the associated change object.

Property CMHasSolutionItem is an array of CMHasSolutionItem relation objects where this ScheduleTask object is the primary referenced object and where the secondary referenced object is a change managed object that was developed as a solution for the associated change object.

Property CMReferences is an array of CMReferences relation objects where this ScheduleTask object is the primary referenced object and where the secondary referenced object is merely a reference for the associated change object and not considered change managed.

Property Cm0Merged is an array of Cm0Merged relation objects where this Fnd0MarkupSpace object is the primary referenced object and where the secondary referenced POM_space object is associated if some of the Fnd0MarkupSpace object content is merged to the POM_space object content.

Condition.description: This condition determines if Cm0BeforeDependency and Cm0ConcurrentDependency are available.
Condition.name: Cm0IsCmDependencyEditable

Condition.description: This condition determines if Cm0BeforeDependency and Cm0ConcurrentDependency are available.
Condition.name: Cm0IsCmDependencyEditableForPrimary

Condition.description: This condition determines if Cm0BeforeDependency and Cm0ConcurrentDependency are available.
Condition.name: Cm0IsCmDependencyEditableForSecondary

Condition.description: This condition determins if cm0Disposition property of CMHasImpactedItem relation is editable or not
Condition.name: Cm0IsDispositionPropertyModifiable

Condition.description: To add Impacted Items the user must have authoring license level, be Requestor or Analyst or Change Contributor, have write access to the change item and it must be in Open state.
Condition.name: Cm0isCMHasImpactedItemCreatable

Condition.description: This condition determines if relations of type CMHasImpactedItem are creatable for the given secondary object.
Condition.name: Cm0isCMHasImpactedItemCreatableForSecondary

Condition.description: To add Impacted Items the change item must be in Open state.
Condition.name: Cm0isCMHasImpactedItemCreatableForTask

Condition.description: To add Problem Items the user must have write access to the change item and it must be in Open state.
Condition.name: Cm0isCMHasProblemItemCreatable

Condition.description: This condition determines if relations of type CMHasProblemItem are creatable for the given secondary object.
Condition.name: Cm0isCMHasProblemItemCreatableForSecondary

Condition.description: To add Problem Items the change item must be in Open state.
Condition.name: Cm0isCMHasProblemItemCreatableForTask

Condition.description: To add Solution Items the user must have authoring license level, be Analyst or Change Contributor, have write access to the change item and it must be in Open & not Reviewing state.
Condition.name: Cm0isCMHasSolutionItemCreatable

Condition.description: This condition determines if relations of type CMHasSolutionItem are creatable for the given secondary object.
Condition.name: Cm0isCMHasSolutionItemCreatableForSecondary

Condition.description: To add Solution Items the user must be Analyst or Change Contributor or schedule task assignee, and change item must be in Open state.
Condition.expression: (Condition::isAnalyst(c,u) OR c.fnd0IsParticipant("Cm0ChangeContributors") OR t.fnd0isTaskAssignee()) AND Condition:: isCMHasSolutionItemCreatableForTask(c,u)
Condition.name: Cm0isCMHasSolutionItemCreatableForTask

Condition.description: This condition determines if relations of type CMHasWorkBreakdown are creatable.
Condition.name: Cm0isCMHasWorkBreakdownCreatable

Condition.description: This condition determines if relations of type CMHasWorkBreakdown are creatable for the given secondary object.
Condition.name: Cm0isCMHasWorkBreakdownCreatableForSecondary

Condition.description: To add Reference Items the change item must be in Open state.
Condition.name: Cm0isCMReferencesCreatableForTask

Condition.description: This condition determines if Change Contributors is assignable.
Condition.name: Cm0isChangeContributorsAssignable

Condition.description: This condition determines if Change Execution is allowed.
Condition.expression: o.CMClosure = "Open" AND o.CMDisposition = "Approved" AND o.CMMaturity = "Executing" AND u.fnd0ConditionHelper.fnd0isSubTypeOf(o, "ChangeNoticeRevision")
Condition.name: Cm0isChangeExecution

Condition.description: This condition determines if a Change Notice is creatable by the user.
Condition.name: Cm0isChangeNoticeCreatable

Condition.description: This condition determines if a Change Request is creatable by the user.
Condition.name: Cm0isChangeRequestCreatable

Condition.description: This condition determines if a Action Item is creatable by the user.
Condition.name: Cm0isCm0ActionItemCreatable

Condition.description: This condition will check the status of Configuration Audit
Condition.name: Cm0isCm0AuditsItemCreatable

Condition.description: This condition determines if a Deviation Request is creatable by the user.
Condition.name: Cm0isCm0DevRqstCreatable

Condition.description: This condition will check the status of Configuration Audit
Condition.name: Cm0isCm0HasContractCreatable

Condition.description: This condition determines if relations of type Cm0Incorporates are creatable.
Condition.expression: Condition::Cm0isCm0IncorporatesCreatableForPrimary(p, u) AND Condition::Cm0isCm0IncorporatesCreatableForSecondary(s, i, c, u) AND Condition::isAuthor(u)
Condition.name: Cm0isCm0IncorporatesCreatable

Condition.description: This condition determines if relations of type Cm0Incorporates are creatable for the given primary object
Condition.name: Cm0isCm0IncorporatesCreatableForPrimary

Condition.description: This condition determines if relations of type Cm0Incorporates are creatable for the given secondary object.
Condition.expression: (i.cm0IncorporationStatus = "Partially Incorporated" AND (c.CMClosure = "Closed" AND c.CMDisposition ="Approved" AND c.CMMaturity = "Complete"))
Condition.name: Cm0isCm0IncorporatesCreatableForSecondary

Condition.description: This condition will check the status of Configuration Audit
Condition.name: Cm0isCm0RaisesActionItemsCreatable

Condition.description: Checks whether Incorporations Status is editable for an Impacted Item or not.
Condition.name: Cm0isIncorporationStatusEditable

Condition.description: This condition determines if the Problem Report is creatable by the user.
Condition.name: Cm0isProblemReportCreatable

Condition.description: This condition determines if the given item revision sequence is active.
Condition.name: isActiveSequence

Condition.description: This condition determines if the current login user is the change analyst of the Change Item Revision.
Condition.name: isAnalyst

Condition.description: This condition determines if Analyst is assignable.
Condition.name: isAnalystAssignable

Condition.description: This condition determines if the current login user is an author.
Condition.name: isAuthor

Condition.description: This condition determines if CMHasImpactedItem relation is creatable.
Condition.expression: Condition::isActiveSequence(p) AND Condition::isCMHasImpactedItemCreatableForPrimary(p, u) AND Condition::isCMHasImpactedItemCreatableForSecondary(s, u) AND Condition::isAuthor(u)
Condition.name: isCMHasImpactedItemCreatable

Condition.description: This condition determines if relations of type CMHasImpactedItem are creatable for the given primary object.
Condition.expression: o.CMClosure = "Open" AND o.is_modifiable = true AND ( Condition::isRequestor(o, u) OR Condition::isAnalyst(o, u) OR o.fnd0IsParticipant("Cm0ChangeContributors") )
Condition.name: isCMHasImpactedItemCreatableForPrimary

Condition.description: This condition determines if relations of type CMHasImpactedItem are creatable for the given secondary object.
Condition.name: isCMHasImpactedItemCreatableForSecondary

Condition.description: This condition determines if relations of type CMHasImpactedItem are creatable with the task.
Condition.name: isCMHasImpactedItemCreatableForTask

Condition.description: This condition determines if CMHasProblemItem relation is creatable.
Condition.name: isCMHasProblemItemCreatable

Condition.description: This condition determines if relations of type CMHasProblemItem are creatable for the given primary object.
Condition.name: isCMHasProblemItemCreatableForPrimary

Condition.description: This condition determines if relations of type CMHasProblemItem are creatable for the given secondary object.
Condition.name: isCMHasProblemItemCreatableForSecondary

Condition.description: This condition determines if relations of type CMHasProblemItem are creatable with the task.
Condition.name: isCMHasProblemItemCreatableForTask

Condition.description: This condition determines if CMHasSolutionItem relation is creatable.
Condition.expression: Condition::isActiveSequence(p) AND Condition::isCMHasSolutionItemCreatableForPrimary(p, u) AND Condition::isCMHasSolutionItemCreatableForSecondary(s, u) AND Condition::isAuthor(u)
Condition.name: isCMHasSolutionItemCreatable

Condition.description: This condition determines if relations of type CMHasSolutionItem are creatable for the given primary object.
Condition.name: isCMHasSolutionItemCreatableForPrimary

Condition.description: This condition determines if relations of type CMHasSolutionItem are creatable for the given secondary object.
Condition.name: isCMHasSolutionItemCreatableForSecondary

Condition.description: This condition determines if relations of type CMHasSolutionItem are creatable with the task.
Condition.name: isCMHasSolutionItemCreatableForTask

Condition.description: This condition determines if relations of type CMHasWorkBreakdown are creatable.
Condition.expression: Condition::isActiveSequence(p) AND Condition::isCMHasWorkBreakdownCreatableForPrimary(p, u) AND Condition::isCMHasWorkBreakdownCreatableForSecondary(s, u) AND Condition::isAuthor(u)
Condition.name: isCMHasWorkBreakdownCreatable

Condition.description: This condition determines if relations of type CMHasWorkBreakdown are creatable for the given primary object.
Condition.name: isCMHasWorkBreakdownCreatableForPrimary

Condition.description: This condition determines if relations of type CMHasWorkBreakdown are creatable for the given secondary object.
Condition.name: isCMHasWorkBreakdownCreatableForSecondary

Condition.description: To derive a change and add Implements relation between change items the user must have authoring license level, and change item must be in Open state.
Condition.name: isCMImplementsCreatable

Condition.description: This condition determines if relations of type CMImplements are creatable for the given primary object.
Condition.name: isCMImplementsCreatableForPrimary

Condition.description: This condition determines if relations of type CMImplements are creatable for the given secondary object.
Condition.name: isCMImplementsCreatableForSecondary

Condition.description: To add Reference Items the user must have write access to the change item and it must be in Open state.
Condition.name: isCMReferencesCreatable

Condition.description: This condition determines if relations of type CMReferences are creatable for the given primary object.
Condition.name: isCMReferencesCreatableForPrimary

Condition.description: This condition determines if relations of type CMReferences are creatable for the given secondary object.
Condition.name: isCMReferencesCreatableForSecondary

Condition.description: This condition determines if relations of type CMReferences are creatable with the task.
Condition.name: isCMReferencesCreatableForTask

Condition.description: This condition determines if Change Execution is allowed.
Condition.expression: o.CMClosure = "Open" AND o.CMMaturity != "Reviewing" AND u.fnd0ConditionHelper.fnd0isSubTypeOf(o, "GnChangeNoticeRevision") AND ( Condition::isAnalyst(o, u) OR o.fnd0IsParticipant("Cm0ChangeContributors"))
Condition.name: isChangeExecutionAllowed

TcCompoundPropertyRule.description: Property analyst_user_id is a compound string derived from this change object's cm0Analyst property. Property analyst_user_id provides the user id string of the assignee found via the cm0Analyst property.

Property change_specialist1_user_id is a compound string derived from this change object's cm0ChangeSpecialist1 property. Property change_specialist1_user_id provides the user id string of the assignee found via the cm0ChangeSpecialist1 property.

Property change_specialist2_user_id is a compound string derived from this change object's ChangeSpecialist2 property. Property change_specialist2_user_id provides the user id string of the assignee found via the ChangeSpecialist2 property.

Property change_specialist3_user_id is a compound string derived from this change object's ChangeSpecialist3 property. Property change_specialist3_user_id provides the user id string of the assignee found via the ChangeSpecialist3 property.

Property cm0Analyst is a compound reference to an Analyst participant object which represents the analyst staffing position assignment for this change object. Property cm0Analyst staffing assignment is used for assignment responsibilities for single assignee tasks in workflows and responsibilities in change management. The Analyst staffing position typically has key technical lead responsibilities with the associated change object. Note that Analyst property is runtime whereas the cm0Analyst property is compound and therefore more versatile.

Property cm0ChangeSpecialist1 is a compound reference to a ChangeSpecialist1 participant object which represents the change specialist 1 staffing position assignment for this change object. Property cm0ChangeSpecialist1 staffing assignment is used for assignment responsibilities for single assignee tasks in workflows and responsibilities in change management. The ChangeSpecialist1 staffing position typically has key administrative management responsibilities with the associated change object. There are ChangeSpecialist1, ChangeSpecialist2 and ChangeSpecialist3 objects, but by default it is only ChangeSpecialist1 we use in Teamcenter Change Management. The other two are there to comply with CMII industry standard and can be exposed and used by customers if they wish. Note that ChangeSpecialist1 property is runtime whereas the cm0ChangeSpecialist1 property is compound and therefore more versatile.

Property cm0Requestor is a compound reference to a Requestor participant object which represents the requestor staffing position assignment for this change object. Property cm0Requestor staffing assignment is used for assignment responsibilities for single assignee tasks in workflows and responsibilities in change management. The requestor staffing position typically has the requirements owner responsibilities with the associated change object. The Requestor object by default is initially set to the creator/owner of the associated change object. Note that Requestor property is runtime whereas the cm0Requestor property is compound and therefore more versatile.

Property requestor_user_id is a compound string derived from this change object's cm0Requestor property. Property requestor_user_id provides the user id string of the assignee found via the cm0Requestor property.
Property cm0isAuditsItemPresent is a compound string which is used in condition Cm0isCm0RaisesActionItemsCreatable to check if Cm0AuditsItem relation is established or not.

Do not use the remaining parts.
Modify the part, and use in the same assembly.
When none of the above fits the user's needs. For example, users may not know the answer or want to decide later.

TcLOV.description: This property indicates the incorporation status of every change
TcLOV.name: Cm0IncorporationStatusValues

TcLOVValue.description: The change as-defined for the Impacted Item has not been yet implemented into a corresponding Solution Item

The change as-defined for the Impacted Item has been partially implemented into a corresponding Solution Item. The change will need to be fully incorporated by a subsequent change into the main chain of revisions of the Item
The change as-defined for the Impacted Item has been implemented in a corresponding Solution Item and no subsequent changes will be required to fully incorporate the defined change
The change as-defined will not be incorporated in any way. This value will indicate that a revision has been identified as an Impacted Item, but the change as-defined will not be applied to the Item
